programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Karen and Will are delighted to discover they share the same taste in books, but Jack is less impressed and starts feeling left out. Meanwhile, the sight of a wedding dress makes Grace fear she will never find and marry the man of her dreams.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is too ill to take Ally to a pyjama party, so Ray reluctantly agrees to do the honours. Unfortunately it means coming face to face with Peggy, an old enemy who physically assaulted him during a charity event.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra wonders how Ray would cope if she met an untimely end, and picks an attractive friend to replace her as his new wife - but cannot help being hurt by his enthusiastic response to the idea.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles puts Daphne on a diet, unaware she has secret stashes of food hidden all over the place. Roz tries a new perfume guaranteed to have a devastating effect on men, while Frasier sets out to save station manager Kenny's marriage - only to end up dating his wife.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles attends a Seattle SuperSonics basketball game with Frasier, where he is plucked out of the crowd at random and offered a big cash prize to sink a half-court shot. David Hyde Pierce stars.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz asks Frasier to narrate her documentary on the history of space travel - but he makes such a hash of it she ends up getting rid of him and recruiting former astronaut John Glenn instead. Meanwhile, Niles tries to relive his childhood by entering a kite-flying competition.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Scottsdale, Arizona, where he meets husband-and-wife bistro owners Samy and Amy Bouzaglo, who reveal a shocking contempt for customer feedback. The chef faces the biggest challenge of the series to save Amy's Baking Company, but can he get through to this defiant pair?.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa Meredith have aspired to own a holiday home in South Tenerife for years, and are ready to pursue their dream now that their children have left home. Jasmine Harman helps them navigate the local property market and shows them an apartment with amazing views for almost £20,000 under their £100,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Cake Makers
programme.desc: New series. Documentary following a group of elite bakers and sugarcraft specialists, beginning with a commission for a gravity-defying five-tier cake that will hang upside down.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: At Pickwick Pawnbrokers in south east London, Nathan and manageress Debbs consider a deal on two vintage saxophones, and deliver a surprise when valuing an antique Japanese helmet.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Television presenter Suzi Perry joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, as Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley host the popular words-and-numbers game.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps more home-buyers find a balance between town and country, including Sue and Richard from West Sussex who are searching for a peaceful, countryside home.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week takes place at The Fox Inn in Guisborough, where hosts Michael Crane and Jai Bennison hope to impress their guests with their northern B&B.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Social carer Kola provides plenty of hip-hop swagger on the third day of the contest in Swansea, with a Nigerian menu he hopes will both educate and impress his fellow diners.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: As the Thanksgiving holiday approaches, Mr Burns hires Homer to amuse him by playing pranks on all and sundry - a situation that upsets Lisa, who has all sorts of old-fashioned ideas about dignity being more important than money.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Leela is caught off guard when she sees DS Armstrong, Mac begs for another chance, and Marnie reaches breaking point. Elsewhere, Lily thinks that she has done enough exam revision until she speaks with Alfie.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: Missy convinces Nas to make a play for her teacher, Lila, but Nas is served a curve ball when her dad announces that he has other plans for her. Confused and emotional, Nas appeals to Lila for help, but Lila draws a line under their friendship. Missy resolves to show her that there are plenty more fish in the sea, though Nas does not take to Missy's expedition to a gay bar and leaves alone early. Meanwhile, a guilt-stricken Mandy ends things with Sadiq and throws herself back into her marriage, and Emma discovers that Samir is engaged.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Doctors treat a young woman who has been thrown from a horse, which then trampled on her, and also a woman who was hit by a car while riding her motorbike on a dual carriageway. Plus, an 11-year-old boy is brought into hospital after running into a wall at school and hurting his wrist.(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Emmit and Sy try to figure out what they have got themselves into, while Nikki and Ray track down some collateral. Elsewhere, Gloria learns more about Maurice.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: A man arrives at Luton police station claiming his life is in danger and that he has just escaped from a slave-owning gang that held him captive at a travellers' site in a remote part of Bedfordshire. Cameras follow as a major operation is launched to investigate the allegations, with more than 200 officers drafted in for a dawn raid on the site to arrest their suspects.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. First up is 24-year-old Rebecca, a singer from Nottinghamshire who is tired of always having her heart broken by guys with a bad boy image and wants to see if choosing a date in the studio can help her pick a better mate. Next up is 25-year-old development manager Dan from Durham, who has unsuccessfully tried countless dating apps and hopes to find Mr Right.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A Staffordshire bull terrier puppy called Rex receives treatment for a badly deformed elbow, and the team carry out a complicated procedure to realign the bones. Meanwhile, a cross-breed called Piggy with spinal problems leaves its family facing a difficult decision, and Noel devises an unorthodox cure for a stray cat with a badly fractured leg.(n)

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A single TV producer is appalled when a chauvinistic presenter is hired for her morning news show. However, she is forced to seek his help when she meets the man of her dreams, and begins testing his theories on what men find attractive. Romantic comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Katherine Heigl, Bree Turner and Eric Winter.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: In Birmingham, Kirstie Allsopp helps 30-year-old neurosurgeon Naomi escape from a crowded shared house, guiding her through the property market of Moseley. Meanwhile, Phil Spencer has a challenge on his hands with a couple who want completely different things. Jon is looking for a one-bedroom flat in the city's stylish Jewellery Quarter, but Mo dreams of a quieter life.(n)

programme.title: Kirstie's Handmade Treasures
programme.desc: The presenter teams up with cider-maker Andy Thomstone to make a winter version of a popular drink, and demonstrates how to create the Italian favourite limoncello using leftover lemons.(n)

programme.title: Shipping Wars UK
programme.desc: Raymond and Grant move a 500kg wooden bear carving from Co Durham to Oxfordshire, while Bev and Graham take a 13ft-high dinosaur sculpture to a golf course in south Wales.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, with Suzi Perry joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: The theft of Will's laptop proves problematic when the policeman assigned to the case demonstrates more than just a professional interest. Michael Douglas guest stars, with Eric McCormack and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Jack asks Karen to assist him with his new magic act, but sacks her for being funnier than him. Will and Grace have their pictures taken by an eccentric photographer, but cannot agree on the finished product. Guest starring Glenn Close, with Eric McCormack and Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra throws a bridal shower for Amy, but Marie tries to take over and monopolises the event. Comedy, starring Ray Romano, Patricia Heaton and Monica Horan.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: When Robert asks if he can borrow the suitcase sitting on the stairway landing, Ray explains he and Debra have been locked in a two-week battle of wills over who is responsible for putting the item away. Ray Romano and Brad Garrett star.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier search for a wealthy patron prepared to give their old school a much-needed cash injection, and soon find the ideal candidate - Martin's new girlfriend. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce, with Barbara Babcock (Hill Street Blues).(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Self-important `corkmaster' Niles arranges a boycott of Frasier's new radio show on wine appreciation, while Martin struggles to escape the powerful clutches of his new physiotherapist - until he samples her delicious cooking. Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce star.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne breezes back into Niles's life, sparking off an argument and casting a shadow over his chances of finding romantic fulfilment. Comedy, starring David Hyde Pierce and Jane Leeves.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to floundering soul food restaurant Blackberry's in Plainfield, New Jersey, but struggles to get his message across to indomitable owner Shelley. Her refusal to deal with the truth comes to a head when Gordon finds a dead mouse in the doorway, prompting him to step up his efforts to change her ways.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Reg and Aby Solomon from Hertfordshire look to buy a family holiday home near the Spanish town of Denia on the popular Costa Blanca. Laura Hamilton searches every nook and cranny of the local market in an attempt to find properties that match the couple's £200,000 budget, but it remains to be seen whether she can deliver the perfect place in the perfect location.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three pairs of partners from Derby take part in the dinner competition, hoping to secure the £1,000 prize. First to host are engaged couple Nicky and Lee, whose attempt at a `posh' menu fails to impress Richard and Julia, who host on night two. Then, at the third party, Dave and Gemma are convinced their organisation in the kitchen will bag them the jackpot - but a guest's belly dancing threatens to overshadow their efforts.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: The Pickwicks staff in London try to secure deals on high-fashion footwear, while in Sheffield, London Road owner Dan takes in a multi-diamond deal from businesswoman `Botox Sue'.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Motor racing presenter Suzi Perry joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner as Nick Hewer hosts the words-and-numbers game, with Rachel Riley on letters-and-numbers duty.(n)

programme.title: Fifteen to One
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig hosts the general knowledge quiz in which 15 contestants try to win a place in the end-of-series final, when a £40,000 jackpot will be up for grabs.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps more home-buyers find a balance between town and country, including young couple Ayden and Pete, who are keen to escape the bright lights of Glasgow.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guests check in at Ivanhoe Guest House in Bridlington, where Mick and Gill Jennings hope their simple approach will win the day. But Michael is quick to pick fault.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Tula serves up a Spanish-themed menu in Swansea, hoping a combination of charm and chorizo can smooth over the dispute between Ross and Julie and avoid a punch-up over the paella.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Bart perform street magic in a bid to impress passers-by and raise enough cash to pay a mechanic's bill. Unfortunately, they quickly realise people are suckers for a sob story, and start conning the public for money. Featuring the guest voice of Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: DS Armstrong is nearly caught by Tegan when up to his old tricks as breaks into the Lomax's, and Marnie is overwhelmed when she receives some true kindness from Myra and Goldie.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: A woman travels all the way from Romania in the hope that Professor Noel Fitzpatrick can mend her dog Clifford's squashed spinal cord. A golden Labrador is offered a total shoulder replacement and a puppy faces losing two of its toes after a collision with a plant pot.(n)

programme.title: Host the Week
programme.desc: Scarlett Moffatt is the guest host for this topical entertainment show, presented each week by a different celebrity. The twist is, the presenter has no rehearsal, no script and no idea of what is coming next, relying instead on a group of improvisers and comedians to guide them through as they deliver a comedy monologue, act in several sketches, interviews guests and anchor a news segment. The show even promises an appearance or two from a few familiar faces.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the words-and-numbers game, with Jon Richardson and Joe Lycett taking on Sean Lock and Michelle Wolf. Adam Riches joins resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Archaeologist Sophie hopes Second World War enthusiast Mark will be the man for her. Also entering the romantic restaurant is comedian Kelly, who worries that she tends to intimidate men. Can high-flying entrepreneur Russell handle her banter? Plus, mum-of-four Heather, 72, hopes retired businessman Gary will keep her company in her twilight years.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: Mr Fussy invites Mr Messy and Mr Strong to his art club, and Miss Sunshine helps Miss Scary create a crafty creature.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: A fallen apple inspires Mofy to write a song, but she is having trouble finishing it. When Kerry invites her to his house for tea, she hopes he can help.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The young pig and George look up to the stars on a stargazing trip with Mummy and Daddy Pig.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The heroine discovers she is the only one in the kingdom who cannot whistle.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodwin is busy training for the town's annual triathlon, giving Mayor Humdinger a chance to plan his most devious scheme yet.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his team are building a new giraffe enclosure at the zoo, but Lofty's excitement about meeting his favourite animal gets the better of him.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman and Mandy discover a baby whale stranded on the beach and it is up to Sam, Penny and Tom Thomas to save the day.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Victor agrees to fix almost every engine on Sodor in one day, but with Thomas's help he learns that it is fine to say no sometimes.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Leah, Zac, Zeta and the genies compete in the Zoomicorn Toss tournament, and Zeta is determined to win, even if it means breaking some of the rules.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Sticky Putty.
programme.desc: Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on Clockwork Mouse's key, and comes up with a clever solution when he finds out who did it and why.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Alex and Mr Porter deliver a pizza up a mountain, but an accident leaves their van dangling over the edge of a cliff.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Gaston catches a cold, so Holly invites him to stay at the castle.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Chips loses Digby's favourite kite in the swamp, his friends are reluctant to help him get it back.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a bedtime story about a sleepy princess and a dinosaur.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Beavers Ed and Ted are unable to agree on the final part of their new dam, so Wissper calls in Kev the crocodile to help her find a solution.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Daddy needs some honey to make a cake, so Wanda and Alien go looking for some. They meet a queen bee who has lost all her workers.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and his guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Tracy Metro advises Gill, who is keen to downsize from her four-bedroom, detached house in Bicester, Oxfordshire. Gill dreams of moving back to her Welsh homeland, but her home is stuck in a 1980s time warp.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: The woman whose car Brody has hijacked demands that he leave, offering him her handbag to appease him, while Zac makes secret plans to leave the Bay.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Finn continues to manipulate the situation in his favour, but the success of his plan still hangs in the balance. Xanthe experiences the full repercussions of her actions.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The agents investigate the deaths of two men killed in a shoot-out, but have to rely on a former naval intelligence officer suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder to help them close the case.(n)

programme.title: Honor Student
programme.desc: A writer is confronted by an ex-convict he once taught as part of a prison education programme, who accuses him of stealing her idea for a novel. Obsessed with revenge, she plans to murder him - but first she intends to make him suffer by ruining his reputation and destroying his marriage. Thriller, starring Josie Loren and Niall Matter.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A case of drink-driving leads to a hot pursuit on the city streets and carnage on the country roads, while a routine stop for speeding gives a lone female officer a worrying surprise. As devastating storms batter the UK, the helicopter crew is called out to rescue a woman trapped by deadly rising river water.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.sub-title: GPs Behind Closed Doors: Best of Patient Files.
programme.desc: Looking back at memorable cases from the observational documentary, including a young patient battling with anorexia who opens up about the devastating effect the illness has had in her life, a man who was the victim of a hit-and-run that left him permanently disabled, and a patient finally has a breakthrough with her attempts to lose weight after visiting the surgery.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The officers try to recover £5,500 owed by a travel agent to a dissatisfied customer in east London, and in Birmingham the agents chase over £2,000 owed by a convenience store owner to a supplier. Elsewhere, in Staffordshire, two officers try to collect several thousand pounds owed by a pensioner after a dispute with his neighbour went all the way to the High Court.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, including celebrity fans' thoughts on the latest developments in the run-up to tomorrow's eviction and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: Cricket on 5
programme.sub-title: England v South Africa: First T20.
programme.desc: England v South Africa. Action from the opening T20 international of the three-match series, which took place at The Ageas Bowl in Hampshire.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: On his final day at Wentworth, Fletch is still trying to find some ammunition against Ferguson, and the arrival of new inmate Kelly Bryant from Blackmoor gives him hope. Bea prepares for the inevitable showdown with Franky after Boomer is released from isolation, but she also plans to use the opportunity to set into motion her elaborate ploy for freedom. Australian drama, starring Danielle Cormack and Nicole da Silva.(n)

programme.title: Cruising with Jane McDonald
programme.desc: The singer sails the Danube on one of the most luxurious ships of its type, as she makes her first foray into the realms of the river cruise. Beginning in Budapest, Jane heads to the Szechenyi Baths, where she indulges in a game of chess. Afterwards, a visit to the Second World War memorial Shoes on the Danube Bank, leaves her in tears. Heading onwards to Vienna, the presenter is all set to meet a real-life princess. Then, after a waltz and a wurst, Jane makes her way to her final stop of Passau, southern Bavaria, to view its charming architecture.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Interior design expert Ann Maurice visits Stepney in London's East End, where she advises part-time DJ Simon Denny on how to make his two-bedroom split-level converted brewery lodge more attractive to potential buyers.(n)

programme.title: House Busters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis and the team visit a north London flat where the owners think they can sense a supernatural presence. Astrologer Robert O'Neil believes a recent death in the family may be a factor, while clairvoyant Gayna Perry notices feelings of disquiet and frustration as she examines the spare room. The final expert thinks the addition of mirrors and wind chimes could prove a calming influence within the property.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: Mr Rude buys a new toothbrush, Mr Grumpy's house is invaded by Miss Sunshine and her friends, and Miss Whoops tries to clean Mr Quiet's teeth.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Foxy rushes up to Mofy and Kerry with news that there is a stranger in the forest. Pre-school animation about a rabbit learning about emotions.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George plan a surprise for Daddy's birthday.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The princess does not want to give up her dummy and wonders why it keeps disappearing. Animation, narrated by Julian Clary.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder finds a map leading to the location of an outlaw's buried treasure, but Mayor Humdinger steals it, and tries to take the loot for himself.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and his team are working on a new driveway at Fixham Town Hall, but Scoop's enthusiasm for breaking up the old one gets the better of him.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The firefighter remains busy with emergencies on his day off - as he rescues Mike from the shop roof, saves Norman from quick-drying cement and puts out a fire in Dilys's shop.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: The island inspector visits Sodor, but Thomas's efforts to impress him go awry.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zeta and Nazboo suck all the glitter out of a volcano, so the twins try to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Toyland Accidents.
programme.desc: Trees are falling down and machines are going crazy, and Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the trouble.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.sub-title: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show.
programme.desc: On the day that a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The duo get trapped by the tide on a family trip to the seaside.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Fizzy has a container that can make things change colour, but all the colour disappears from Applecross when Grizel and Mungo get their hands on it.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George and Peppa hold a fancy-dress party and invite all their friends.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: When Otis the oxpecker is grounded by an injured wing, Wissper asks Peggy the pingwing to show him how to have fun without flying.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: Everybody is in the garden on a hot day, and Alien tries to cheer up a sad-looking sunflower by playing music.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: The day's news comes under scrutiny from Matthew Wright and the panel, with viewers and the studio audience invited to share their opinions.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Tracy Metro heads to North Yorkshire to offer advice to Anne and Vernon, who are keen to sell their well-proportioned Edwardian home.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac talks to Hunter about his plans to leave, but is shaken when he hears about the DNA test his son has ordered online. Marilyn tries to bring Leah and Irene together over lunch.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Karl insists Susan undergo proper procedure to ensure all is well. David decides to use Amy's housewarming as his moment to introduce Tom to everyone as his new boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and the team are called in to look for the body of a murdered Muslim man that has gone missing from the morgue. As they try to establish a link between a top-secret residue found on the corpse and the victim's killers, their investigations uncover an experimental Navy tracking system and a plot to sell nuclear material to terrorists planning to make a bomb. Starring Chris O'Donnell and LL Cool J.(n)

programme.title: Missing at 17
programme.desc: An adopted teenager runs away from home to find her biological parents, and meets a man who offers to help her. However, after she is rejected by her birth mother, he instead lures her into assisting his criminal activities, while her adoptive family frantically tries to bring her home. Drama, starring Ayla Kell and Tricia O'Kelley.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Karl insists Susan undergo proper procedure to ensure all is well. David decides to use Amy's housewarming as his moment to introduce Tom to everyone as his new boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Zac talks to Hunter about his plans to leave, but is shaken when he hears about the DNA test his son has ordered online. Marilyn tries to bring Leah and Irene together over lunch.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A reckless car thief seems intent on causing carnage, while the pursuit of an unlicensed driver through a housing estate has grave consequences. Inspector Ed Turner turns up more than he bargains for when the pursuit of a suspected heroin user takes a turn for the worse, and elsewhere officers face one of the biggest challenges of their careers when a stolen JCB goes on the rampage.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: On Benefits: It's a Hard Knock Life.
programme.desc: People getting by on benefits in the Midlands. Thirty-year-old Derby man James believes his bipolar disorder prevents him having a regular job His dream is to be a full-time entertainer - will his alter ego Mrs Plonker help him into spotlight? Plus, a part-time cleaner who wants to become a model and a former publican whose type 2 diabetes is hindering her search for work.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Emma Willis hosts the latest eviction, one day earlier than usual, revealing which of this week's nominees the public have voted out, then chatting to them about their time on the show, who they think voted for them and why they feel it was their time to go. But before that, there's the question of seeing how they've all been getting on in the regular round-up.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal discusses tonight's eviction, asking the panel whether the public made the right decision, talking to Emma Willis and meeting the unlucky ex-housemate.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.sub-title: Big Brother: Live from the House.
programme.desc: Live streaming action picking up with the hopefuls to reveal how they are getting on since saying goodbye to another housemate in tonight's eviction.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Explorer Rick O¿Connell (Brendan Frasier) and his wife Evelyn (Maria Bello) are now retired. But they are also quite bored, so when they are invited by the British government to take a precious gem to China they don¿t think twice. The ancient stone is capable of resurrecting the Emperor Han and of pointing the way to Shangri-La. When the couple reaches China, they meet their son Alex, who has discovered the tomb of Han, and Evelyn's brother Jonathan Carnahan. Centuries ago, the evil Emperor Han was cursed by the sorceress Zi Yuan who transformed him and his army into mummies. When the explorers are betrayed by a friend, the mummy is awoken from a 2,000-year-old curse and now threatens to plunge the world into his merciless, unending service(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: While on a forced holiday due to his feud with a local crime lord, a San Francisco police detective becomes involved with a rape victim who has become a lethal vigilante(n)

programme.title: Off Air
programme.desc: Off Air(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: This drama is based on Laurel Hester a New Jersey police lieutenant (Julianne Moore) and her domestic partner Stacie Andree (Ellen Page) who battle to have pension benefits from Hester pass on to her partner after she is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. Directed by Peter Sollett. Also stars Steve Carell, Michael Shannon, Josh Charles, Luke Grimes, Mary Birdsong and Gabriel Luna(n)

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Luke Wilson, Vince Vaughn and Will Ferrell star in this raucous comedy reminiscent of "Animal House." They play three disillusioned men who decide to start a fraternity near their old college in an effort to recapture their youth(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: SNL alumni Tina Fey and Amy Poehler co-star in this Universal Studios comedy about two daffy adult sisters, one an irresponsible single mom and the other a kindhearted nurse, who decide to throw one last wild party at their childhood home before it's sold by their parents. However, their bash ends up going disastrously awry. Written by Paula Pell and directed by Jason Moore(n)

programme.title: Stuck on You
programme.desc: Directors Bobby and Peter Farrelly making a film about conjoined twins sounds like a recipe for stomach-churning grossness, but Stuck on You gets its laughs from others, not the twins. Bo and Walt run a diner in Martha's Vineyard, but Walt yearns for Hollywood stardom. Bo agrees to humour him and they hit LA, where Walt lands a part in a TV series starring Cher (herself): the shy Bo has to be hidden by scenery or "brushed out" from the scene. But Bo harbours a love for LA-based May (Wen Yann Shih), their romance previously conducted on-line, while Walt falls for April (Eva Mendes), an understanding pool babe. Can the disparate pair find love, success and happiness? With cameos from Jack Nicholson and Meryl Streep(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A man survives an assassination attempt, only to find he's destined to join a band of mystical killers(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this clever, offbeat Western(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates an underworld subculture of Los Angeles street racers to bust a hijacking ring. He begins to question his loyalties when his new street racing friends become the prime suspects(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between a rookie cop and his seasoned partner (who's also his future brother-in-law) in this sidesplitting action comedy. After discovering a mysterious flash drive during an arrest, the pair travel to Miami to hunt down a drug lord with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: Four soldiers, finding a map indicating the location of secret bunkers inside the Iraqi border, go AWOL and head for the bunkers to get the gold looted from Kuwait which they believe to be hidden inside. However, they find a population being terrorised by Saddam Hussein's forces and desperate for help, and soon realise some things are more important than riches(n)

programme.title: The Dead Pool
programme.desc: The fifth film to feature Clint Eastwood's immortal 'Dirty' Harry Callahan, The Dead Pool is a crime thriller that sees celebrities being killed in mysterious circumstances. While Harry is investigating the death of rock star Johnny Squares (Jim Carrey), who died on location filming a movie directed by Peter Swan (Liam Neeson), he begins to get suspicious. Harry discovers that Swan and several other people are playing a game called the dead pool, wherein they make a list of famous people who they think may die and place large sums of money on the outcome. Squares was on Swan's list, as were a number of other recently deceased - and when Harry sees his own name he knows it's time to act fast. With cameos and music from Guns n'Roses(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Undercover Brother is recruited by the secret organisation called the B.R.O.T.H.E.R.H.O.O.D. to foil the attempts of The Man to destroy racial unity(n)

programme.title: On Time
programme.desc: A woman who is running late for a job interview is forced to make a tough decision. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2016 American Black Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Dragonfly
programme.desc: A doctor struggles with grief after his wife is killed while working with the Red Cross in Venezuela, but when he sees a pattern in the sketches of children in his hospital, he becomes convinced that she is trying to contact him(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy fashion magazine(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: The Johnsons set out from California for a family reunion in Missouri. The parents are split up, the kids are arguing - can everyone keep it together for the big day?(n)

programme.title: Suffragette
programme.desc: A working-class laundress in 19th-century London becomes radicalised when she meets a brave cadre of women who are fighting for the right to vote(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman won a much-deserved Best Actor Oscar for his uncannily astounding performance as "In Cold Blood" author Truman Capote. The exceptional biopic spans the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece. Catherine Keener received a Best Supporting Oscar nod as Capote's friend and researcher Harper Lee, who a few years later would publish "To Kill a Mockingbird." Dan Futterman's script was also Oscar-nominated. Clifton Collins Jr., Chris Cooper, Bob Balaban, Amy Ryan(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A film based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their maze trials after narrowly escaping the first test in this young-adult dystopian sequel(n)

programme.title: Right at Your Door
programme.desc: In the wake of the detonation of a 'dirty bomb' in LA and under the instruction of a public service announcement, Brad barricades himself within his home. With his wife Lexi on her way to work, he desperately tries to call her in an attempt to find out if she is safe and well. As time elapses and his worse fear looks set to manifest, Lexi appears outside the family home. If he allows his wife inside, he risks contaminating the house with deadly germs..(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: Meg Altman buys an old brownstone apartment fitted with a 'panic room', a secret, state-of-the-art chamber to hide from burglars. She never thought she'd need it, until she heard the glass break downstairs... Stylish, suspense thriller(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: An FBI investigator pursues a deranged serial killer, nicknamed "The Tooth Fairy", with the help of his most prolific captured killer(n)

programme.desc: A Bicyclops Built for Two. The Professor goes online using AOL, which has turned into a virtual reality experience. While in a chat room, Leela meets Alcazar, who claims to be a cyclops. She visits his planet and learns that they are the last two living cyclopses from the planet Cyclopia. After they spend the night together, Alcazar starts acting like a real jerk and the episode turns into a parody of Married...With Children with Alcazar as Al Bundy and Leela as Peggy Bundy . She accepts his marriage proposal while Fry and Bender find out that Alcazar is not a cyclops, but a shapeshifting alien who already proposed to four other women. programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: The Problem With Popplers. After they go to the planet of the Moochers, the Planet Express crew stop for food. They discover a tasty delicacy and bring it home, naming them Popplers. Teaming up with fast food mogul Fishy Joe, they plan to market the Popplers and make a lot of money off them. Then Free Waterfall Jr. (voice of Phil Hendrie) from Mankind for Ethical Animal Treatment (MEAT) starts protesting because he believes Popplers are intelligent, living creatures. Leela joins his cause when she makes friends with a Poppler baby. Leela, Fishy Joe, and Free Waterfall Jr. appear on a talk show to discuss the ethics of eating Popplers just as New New York is invaded by the Omnicronians, led by Lrrr. They plan to eat the people of New New York because the humans have been eating their babies. After a negotiation with Zapp Brannigan, the Omnicronians agree to eat just one human in a live televised event. Leela is selected to be eaten, but the Poppler baby comes to her rescue(n)

programme.desc: Mother's Day. The Professor is the key to stopping a robot-and-machine revolt against humans, as ordered by robot-creator Mom, who seeks to be declared Supreme Overlord of Earth(n)

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: Anthology of Interest 1. In the season finale episode, "Anthology of Interest I," Professor Farnsworth unveils his "What-if" machine and Bender, Leela, and Fry each get a chance to ask it a question. Bender asks what it would be like if he were 500 feet tall, so he becomes a giant and flies to Earth to the tune of Black Sabbath's "Iron Man." He befriends a boy (Fry) and accidentally destroys the city in a take on The Iron Giant. The Professor then makes Dr. Zoidberg a giant so they can fight each other. Leela asks what it would be like if she were more impulsive, so she ends up killing the Professor in order to get his fortune. As people find out about the murder, she is forced to kill them one by one until she has killed almost everyone. Fry asks what it would be like if he were never cryogenically frozen in 1999. He ends up meeting the Action Rangers -- made up of scientist Stephen Hawking, Vice President Al Gore, Star Trek actress Nichelle Nichols, and Dungeons and Dragons creator Gary Gygax(n)

programme.title: New Girl

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon hires an attractive female assistant, but when she becomes interested in Leonard, Penny decides to mark her territory by sleeping with him. Meanwhile, Howard starts to lose his mind when his return from space is delayed another week. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Africa
programme.desc: The wildlife of the African deserts, where rain may not fall for 10 years at a time. In spite of inhospitable conditions, a multitude of species survives in these arid landscapes, including cartwheeling spiders, camels, squirrels which use their tails as sunshades, and even crocodiles.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates Brad Bestelink's documentary, which was filmed over the course of 18 months and follows a female leopard and its two cubs living in the wilds of Botswana alongside less-than-friendly lions, wild dogs and hyenas. The competition for food is tough, and the cats have to learn the new skill of fishing if they are to have any chance of survival.(n)

programme.title: This Wild Life
programme.desc: The safari camp reopens after the rainy season, but Saba Douglas-Hamilton worst nightmare is turning into reality. She has a houseful of guests on their way, but the cupboards are bare and there's nowhere for them to sleep. Her husband Frank Pope has problems of his own as he attempts to fit a tracking device to a six-ton bull elephant.(n)

programme.title: This Wild Life
programme.desc: Samburu National Reserve's safari camp faces its busiest week yet, as wildlife expert Saba Douglas-Hamilton embarks on a mission to find newborn lion cubs. Meanwhile, her husband Frank Pope races to rescue a lioness in need of help. The pair's troubles are compounded when a power crisis strikes the camp, and one member of the team is rushed to hospital with what is suspected to be malaria.(n)

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: David Attenborough looks at the varied creatures of the Congo rainforest, one of the most competitive habitats on Earth. A sweet-toothed chimpanzee uses a complex array of tools to access honey from a beehive, the elusive picathartes bird feeds unsuspecting frogs to its dinosaur-like chicks and a massive female python reveals her maternal side as she sunbathes to incubate her eggs. Tiny leaf-folding frogs battle it out kung fu style, and as darkness falls the forest elephants gather to face their rivals.(n)

programme.title: Wild Africa

In spite of inhospitable conditions, a multitude of species survives in these arid landscapes, including cartwheeling spiders, camels, squirrels which use their tails as sunshades, and even crocodiles.(n)

programme.title: Wildest Africa
programme.desc: Exploring the Ngorongoro crater in northern Tanzania, considered to be one of Africa's most treasured wonders, including a look at the wildlife that inhabits the area.(n)

programme.title: Trek: Spy on the Wildebeest
programme.desc: Conclusion. The migration reaches Kenya's Masai Mara, where the river presents the strongest challenge yet for the calves. Cameras reveal how crocodiles and hippos are preying on stragglers, while the rough waters threaten to sweep the animals away.(n)

programme.title: Outback Rangers
programme.desc: One of the team tracks quolls, and a pair attempt to tag freshwater sharks. Following the lives of armed rangers at Kakadu National Park in the Northern Territory, Australia.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Wild Africa
programme.desc: Fergal Keane narrates a documentary focusing on the abundant wildlife found along the continent's 29,000km coastline. Species exist in habitats as diverse as the icy waters of the Cape and the tropical climes of the Indian Ocean, leading to some bizarre variations in behaviour - seals eat birds and die of heatstroke, crabs climb trees and penguins live in deserts.(n)

programme.title: Walking with Elephants
programme.desc: Nature documentary, with Steve Bolnick. The presenter and safari guide strongly believes that people can gain a better understanding of wildlife by walking in the Bush with animals.(n)

programme.title: This Wild Life
programme.desc: Saba's guests are accidentally stranded at a remote airstrip in the scorching African sun, as the summer heats up, and the race is on to pick them up, while Saba prepares the camp for their arrival. Meanwhile, husband Frank puts himself on the frontline in the fight against ivory poachers.(n)

programme.title: This Wild Life
programme.desc: The drought begins to make everyday life difficult for the people and animals in Kenya's Samburu National Park, and Saba's plan to track down elephants for her guests goes wrong. Frank is concerned about a herd of young orphaned elephants heading into danger with no leader to guide them to safety.(n)

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: David Attenborough describes some of the wildlife spectacles of southern Africa, starting out in a little-explored rainforest discovered less than a decade ago by scientists who spotted it on satellite maps. There, thousands of butterflies dance for the right to mate, while on a tiny island off Mozambique, green turtles emerge from eggs and begin a hazardous journey to the water - with pied crows and hungry crabs eager to get them. Cameras also capture one of the largest gatherings of great white sharks on the planet as 30 of the predators circle around a dead whale.(n)

programme.title: Wildest Africa
programme.desc: Exploring the landscape of the Namib Desert, considered to be one of the most striking landscapes in Africa, with its rugged mountain ranges and hauntingly beautiful deserts.(n)

programme.title: Six Feet Under the Savannah
programme.desc: Documentary studying the East African savannah and the habits of the naked mole-rat, which lives in the harsh conditions beneath the surface of the sand and dwells in queen-oriented communities similar to insect societies. The film uses sophisticated slow motion filming techniques and a replica of the animal's habitat in a vivarium to bring the unusual creatures' world to life.(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: Rousing action drama in which the US Navy's elite commando force, the SEALs (Sea, Air, Land), is sent to rescue hostages from a ship in the Middle East. A plot is uncovered to sell stolen Stinger missiles to terrorists, but when the SEALs launch a surprise attack in Syria to retrieve the armaments, the terrorists become more aggressive and the mission more dangerous, culminating in an invasion of besieged Beirut(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: James Vanderbilt wrote and directed this docudrama about the controversial 60 Minutes exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service that aired just before the 2004 election. Cate Blanchett stars as Mary Mapes, the producer of CBS's newsmagazine series 60 Minutes, which was anchored at the time by the legendary Dan Rather (Robert Redford). Mapes gets a tip from a new source who claims to possess explosive documents proving that Bush received privileged treatment in the National Guard to avoid service in the Vietnam War. After the documents are presented to the American people, a whirlwind of controversy about the their veracity pits Mapes and Rather in a battle for their journalistic lives. Topher Grace, Dennis Quaid, and Elizabeth Moss co-star in this ensemble journalistic thriller(n)

programme.title: Vamps
programme.desc: Radiant New York City vampires Goody (Alicia Silverstone) and Stacy (Krysten Ritter) find their immortality in question after they learn that true love endures in the realm of the undead. Meanwhile, Russian bloodsucker Vadim (Justin Kirk) prowls the streets in search of the next big thrill, Dr. Van Helsing (Wallace Shawn) seeks to exterminate the creatures of the night, and young Joey Van Helsing (Dan Stevens) develops an unusual fixation on Stacy. As ravenous vampire Cisserus (Sigourney Weaver) presides over her dark dynasty with the help of her loyal assistant Ivan (Todd Barry), oddball Renfield (Zak Orth) strives to impress Stacy and Goody by any means necessary. Amidst all of the bloodshed and intrigue, nefarious vampire Vlad (Malcolm McDowell) works to perfect his knitting skills(n)

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: This pulse-pounding follow-up to Sergio Leone's A Fistful of Dollars brings back Clint Eastwood as the serape-clad, cigar-chewing "Man With No Name." Engaged in an ongoing battle with bounty hunter Col. Douglas Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef), the Man joins forces with his enemy to capture homicidal bandit Indio (Gian Maria Volontè). Both the Eastwood and Van Cleef characters are given understandable motivations for their bloodletting tendencies, something that was lacking in A Fistful of Dollars. In both films, however, the violence is raw and uninhibited -- and in many ways, curiously poetic. Leone's tense, tight close-ups, pregnant pauses, and significant silences have since been absorbed into the standard spaghetti Western lexicon; likewise, Ennio Morricone's haunting musical score has been endlessly imitated and parodied. For a Few Dollars More was originally titled Per Qualche Dollaro in Più; it would be followed by the last and best of the Man with No Name trilogy, The Good, the Bad and the Ugly(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: Rousing action drama in which the US Navy's elite commando force, the SEALs (Sea, Air, Land), is sent to rescue hostages from a ship in the Middle East. A plot is uncovered to sell stolen Stinger missiles to terrorists, but when the SEALs launch a surprise attack in Syria to retrieve the armaments, the terrorists become more aggressive and the mission more dangerous, culminating in an invasion of besieged Beirut(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: An ex-Playboy bunny tries to turn some wallflowers into the hottest girls on a university campus(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: James Vanderbilt wrote and directed this docudrama about the controversial 60 Minutes exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service that aired just before the 2004 election. Cate Blanchett stars as Mary Mapes, the producer of CBS's newsmagazine series 60 Minutes, which was anchored at the time by the legendary Dan Rather (Robert Redford). Mapes gets a tip from a new source who claims to possess explosive documents proving that Bush received privileged treatment in the National Guard to avoid service in the Vietnam War. After the documents are presented to the American people, a whirlwind of controversy about the their veracity pits Mapes and Rather in a battle for their journalistic lives. Topher Grace, Dennis Quaid, and Elizabeth Moss co-star in this ensemble journalistic thriller(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: Bruce Willis is the leader of a group of defiant soldiers plotting an elaborate escape from a German POW camp during WWII(n)

programme.title: Navy SEALs
programme.desc: Rousing action drama in which the US Navy's elite commando force, the SEALs (Sea, Air, Land), is sent to rescue hostages from a ship in the Middle East. A plot is uncovered to sell stolen Stinger missiles to terrorists, but when the SEALs launch a surprise attack in Syria to retrieve the armaments, the terrorists become more aggressive and the mission more dangerous, culminating in an invasion of besieged Beirut(n)

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Thriller about three men who find millions of dollars in the wreck of a single-engine plane buried in the deep snow of a Minnesota winter. Deciding to see whether the money is missed come the spring thaw - when the plane will be found - they try to sit on their secret without arousing the suspicions of family and neighbours or cracking under the unexpected pressures that gradually accrue(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The Right Decision. Tommy and Ghost get back together to take on a ruthless foe and enlist Tasha in hopes of evading detection by Angela and her team. Later, Tommy soldiers on, but Ghost comes undone at a vital juncture(n)

programme.title: Planet Terror
programme.desc: Maverick filmmaker Robert Rodriguez details the violent struggle between a ravenous army of zombie-like humanoids who have taken control of the planet and the remaining survivors who refuse to go down without a fight. A dangerous government experiment has unleashed an abominable contamination that turns normal people into murderous mutants. Now, as an infinitely multiplying horde of frenzied psychotics flood the Texas plains, a dangerous outlaw named Wray (Freddy Rodriguez), a sexy stripper named Cherry (Rose McGowan), an unscrupulous smuggler named Abby (Naveen Andrews), and the curiously incapacitated Dr. Dakota Block (Marley Shelton) must try and make their way to the helicopter that could provide their only means of escaping to a place untouched by this nightmarish scourge that threatens to wipe out all of humankind. This nonstop action-horror hybrid originally was released as part of Rodriguez and Quentin Tarantino's ambitious Grindhouse double bill(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: A re-creation of the mean streets of Manhattan in the historical epic set in the 1860s(n)

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace
programme.desc: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door. A young couple has just moved into their California dream home when they become the target of their next-door neighbour, who disapproves of their relationship. A stern, single father, this tightly wound LAPD officer has appointed himself the watchdog of the neighbourhood. His nightly foot patrols and overly watchful eyes bring comfort to some, but he becomes increasingly aggressive to the newlyweds. These persistent intrusions into their lives cause the couple to fight back(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: While out on a call, Roy Neary, a power repairman, witnesses' unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. This encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Neary tries desperately to understand what he has experienced. He is baffled by the governmental cover-up that blocks his efforts, however, and finds himself increasingly driven to the emotional edge. His wife cannot understand what is happening and finds her relationship with her husband disintegrating. In his quest, Neary clings to an ally in Jillian Guiler, who has witnessed with him the nocturnal encounter. Together, they pursue an answer to the extraordinary mystery that has engulfed them. Richard Dreyfuss, Teri Garr and Melinda Dillon(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh directs Disney's 2015, live-action take on the classic fairy tale Cinderella, which stars Lily James as the put-upon young women forced to endure a life of labor at the hands of her stepmother (Cate Blanchett) after her father dies unexpectedly. Forced to do every menial chore imaginable, Ella maintains her good spirits and eventually strikes up a friendship with a stranger in the woods who turns out to be the prince. When the royal court holds a gala ball, Cinderella wants nothing more to attend, and although her stepmother won't allow it, she gets help from a surprising source(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus named Arlo (voiced by Raymond Ochoa) loses his father in a storm and is swept away by a vicious river current, stranding him in a frightening new place far from his home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child known as Spot (Jack Bright) along the way.Peter Sohn directed this heartwarming Pixar adventure, with Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Anna Paquin, and Sam Elliott also contributing voice work(n)

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Ricki is an aging rock-n'roll-loving woman who abandoned her family in order to chase her tattered dream of becoming a famous rock star. Now, she is given one last chance to set things right when her ex-husband, Pete, asks her to visit her estranged daughter, Julie, in Chicago(n)

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Thriller about three men who find millions of dollars in the wreck of a single-engine plane buried in the deep snow of a Minnesota winter. programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Three black friends gather for a wedding, and recall their teen years growing up in 1980s Inglewood, Cal., after the groom gets cold feet and starts thinking about his high-school sweetheart(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Go. Angela is left staggered after the breakup, but must rally to take on a difficult situation at work; Ghost scrambles to hold onto the club deal, while he and Tommy get reacclimated to the game. Also, Dre learns just what the La Arana card means(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Trust Me. As Mike and Angela try to ferret out the mole, she picks up a lead while trying to firm up Tommy's alibi; Tasha gets a warning; Tariq makes a dangerous new friend; and Milan orders that a new product be pushed(n)

programme.title: Way of The Dragon
programme.desc: Martial-arts mayhem with Bruce Lee taking on mobsters in Rome(n)

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A bounty hunter must fight to stay alive as he plays a deadly game, created by a wealthy and evil mastermind, in which he must hunt down his opponents before they are able kill him(n)

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Helen's attitude towards local myths and urban legends is cool to say the least, so when she hears about a hook-handed killer who supposedly stalks the streets at night and can be summoned by five chants of 'Candyman' into a mirror, she is naturally reluctant to believe the story. Instead, she decides to use the myth as a basis for her doctoral thesis. But as her investigations lead her to a recent murder which has been attributed to the Candyman, Helen's belief in what is possible and what is not is shaken. For she has uncovered a dark and sinister presence and soon finds herself the suspect in a murder enquiry. Based on a story by British horror maestro Clive Barker(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Jon Voight stars as Paul Sarone, a slimy snake catcher in the Amazon on the trail of the biggest prize of all - a 40 foot long anaconda. The villainous Sarone will stop at nothing to catch his prey, even taking a documentary film crew hostage so he can use their boat. It's Saturday matinee 'horror' in the style of The Creature From The Black Lagoon - camp and implausibly cheesy, but great fun(n)

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: Fast-paced fantasy about a cutting-edge games designer who must seek refuge in her own state-of-the-art virtual reality game when her life is put in danger on the launch of her new project(n)

programme.title: Jaws: The Revenge
programme.desc: Fourth in the series of action adventures about a malevolent great white shark. After her younger son is killed in the water, the widow of the man who killed the shark that first terrorised the seaside community of Amity begins to believe her entire family is targeted by a monster of the deep. She heads for the Bahamas to warn her other son, a marine biologist, unaware that she is being followed by a large, hungry fish bent on revenge(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed during a nuclear arms purchase, his partner recruits the dead man's twin brother, Jake. Jake had no idea that he had a twin brother, let alone that he worked for the CIA(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Jon Voight stars as Paul Sarone, a slimy snake catcher in the Amazon on the trail of the biggest prize of all - a 40 foot long anaconda. It's Saturday matinee 'horror' in the style of The Creature From The Black Lagoon - camp and implausibly cheesy, but great fun(n)

programme.title: Howard the Duck
programme.desc: Director and co-screenwriter Willard Huyck has taken Steve Garber's abrasive, beer-drinking and cigar-smoking comic-book character and castrated him, turning him into a wide-eyed cutesy-pie available for the toy shelves. Huyck's Howard the Duck is a being from outer space, blown into Cleveland by an errant laser beam. After a few minutes on Earth, Howard runs into rock singer Beverly Switzler (Lea Thompson), and they become fast friends after Howard protects her from a couple of nasty punkers. The film then degenerates into an extended chase, as Howard and Beverly are pursued by government agents who want to capture Howard before he can be beamed back into space(n)

programme.title: Warren Miller's Wintervention
programme.desc: Wintervention follows expert skiers and snowboarders like Hugo Harrison, Chris Davenport, and Reggie Crist as they travel the globe looking for the steepest slopes to conquer(n)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. But when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again. Based on Peter Benchley's bestseller, three sequels and numerous imitations followed(n)
