programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk and the Captain's Wife.
programme.desc: A misaligned sundial provides Adrian with the clue he needs to solve the murder of a driver who was shot at the wheel of his tow truck and ploughed into Karen Stottlemeyer's car, seriously injuring her. Drama, starring Tony Shalhoub, Ted Levine and Glenne Headly.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is kidnapped, but as Lisbon and the team go back over his previous cases in search of clues to the abductor's identity, they realise he had numerous enemies, any one of whom might be responsible. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane accepts the help of local astrologer Ellis Mars to solve the case of a triple murder involving two police officers. John Billingsley (True Blood) guest stars in an edition of the crime drama directed by leading actor Simon Baker. With Robin Tunney and Owain Yeoman.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: A thieving scientist discredits one of his work colleagues by passing off a large volume of work as his own. The team tries to bring him to book by convincing him that he has made contact with aliens from another planet. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team pursues a restaurateur who will stop at nothing to achieve fame and fortune. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Conclusion. After the deaths of two family members of NCIS employees, the team identifies the killer as a Swedish mercenary and the ballistics report reveals the bullets came from an Iranian arms dealer. McGee traces a wire transfer made to the hitman's ex-wife and son to an account under the name Virtue, and Ziva makes a connection after realising what the Hebrew translation is.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to the scene of a fatal car crash involving marine lance corporal Chad Dunn and student Lyla Cutwright. Duckie notices that the woman's injuries do not match the specifics of the accident and there are no skidmarks found at the scene, leading Gibbs to declare they possibly have a murder and a suicide on their hands. Abby calls in sick for the first time after the case stirs up a traumatic incident from her childhood. Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette star.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The CBI tries to solve the murder of a Santa Claus impersonator, and Jane is questioned by an independent investigator in connection with the death of cop-killer Todd Johnson, who was set on fire while in police custody. Drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A journalist is found dead at a martial arts contest, raising the possibility that two competitors are guilty of murder. The team calls the suspects in for an interview, but Jane comes up with an alternative plan to ensnare the culprit. Elsewhere, an internal investigator questions Rigsby about his father. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.sub-title: The Gimme a K Street Job.
programme.desc: The team is forced to tackle the US Congress to take down a competitive cheerleading company that is putting teenage girls at risk. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs and battle injustice in the corridors of power.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate becomes obsessed by a dying FBI agent's greatest failure, to allow skyjacker DB Cooper to escape justice, and a flashback to the 1970s helps solve the long-standing mystery. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team capture computer hacker Ajay Khan, who was recently responsible for hacking into NCIS's supposedly ultra-secure multiple-threat alert centre. They believe he could hold the key to tracking down the most-wanted cyber terrorist in the world, who may be plotting an attack using a bomb containing a strain of the Ebola virus. When Khan refuses to co-operate, Ziva and DiNozzo take him to Guantanamo Bay to be placed with people he had previously betrayed. Guest starring Vik Sahay (Chuck).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the case of a marine who dropped dead while scaling a wall on an assault course, and a fellow soldier reveals that he was heavily involved with an underground fight club, where competitors would battle for cash. Meanwhile, having returned to work after compassionate leave, Vance discovers paperwork and a key in his late wife's effects that lead him to a safety deposit box containing a stash of cash.(n)

programme.title: Shots Fired
programme.desc: Ashe and Preston try to narrow their focus to reliable lines of inquiry in both cases, first visiting Jesse Carr's old college campus, then embarking on a dangerous manhunt.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Nova-Centauris-burgh Board of Tourism Presents: American Dad.
programme.desc: Steve and his friends start up a live-action role-playing game, and Francine finds herself strangely drawn to the fantasy world they create. Meanwhile, Stan opens a marine animal theme park in the Smith family home.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan begins to question Christianity after Steve asks some uncomfortable questions about everything written in the Bible. Now facing a crisis of faith, the secret agent takes his family to Korea to investigate reports of reinvented Noah's Ark.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois's wealthy aunt dies, leaving the Griffins her Rhode Island holiday home - but the family feels uneasy living in luxury. Peter takes lessons to become a debonair gentleman and ends up inadvertently giving away his new-found wealth. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth McFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter's father moves in and immediately begins to take over the entire household, telling the children which TV shows they can watch, giving Lois unwanted advice on parenting and generally ordering everyone around.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve uncovers a conspiracy dating back to the Civil War while researching a paper on George Washington Carver for Black History Month. However, he is forced to fight for his life after the Smithsonian Peanut Museum curator is murdered, and a secret society will stop at nothing to prevent the undisclosed information from being revealed.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan becomes convinced that the world is in the grip of a nuclear war when he arrives late for a CIA practice drill, and retreats to the mountains with his family. However, after realising his mistake, he is uncertain about whether to give up his new life and return to civilisation.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: Rick forgot to check the oil in his car and has the task of fixing it.(n)

programme.title: Rick and Morty
programme.desc: Beth and Jerry sort out their relationship and Rick joins in on some hi-jinks.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan becomes a drag racer in an effort to satisfy Francine's desire for more excitement in their marriage. Meanwhile, Hayley breaks up with Jeff - who deals with his heartache by immersing himself in the world of online gaming. Animated comedy about a CIA agent and his dysfunctional family.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan and Francine try for another baby, while Roger decides to enrol at the same college as Hayley in a bid to experience student life - but somehow ends up teaching a class. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Wendy Schaal.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The family sets out on a trip to New York in a bid to win back Chris's place in a Scout group, but Peter takes a wrong turn en route and ends up at a Native American casino - where Lois becomes obsessed with the slot machines. Animated comedy, with the voices of Seth Green and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: A heatwave hits Quahog, and Peter enters Brian in a dog show in the hope of winning enough money to buy a new air-conditioning unit. However, the erudite canine feels humiliated and runs away from home - only to find himself hauled off to the pound and sentenced to death.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan begins to feel that his CIA career has stalled and decides to become an entrepreneur. Filled with zeal, he opens a teddy bear factory - but Hayley is offended by his business ethics and takes drastic measures to improve them.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger is rejected by Steve and seeks out another human companion - who soon becomes abusive, prompting Hayley to extricate him from the relationship. Meanwhile, Stan takes a tour of the Mr Pibb factory and meets the man himself. Featuring the voices of Patton Oswalt and Peter Graves.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Sharona and Adrian pretend to be a married couple and attend counselling sessions in a bid to flush out a conman who has tied the knot with Disher's mother. Detective drama, guest starring Nestor Carbonell (Lost) and Jane Lynch (Glee).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The CBI tries to solve the murder of a Santa Claus impersonator, and Jane is questioned by an independent investigator in connection with the death of cop-killer Todd Johnson, who was set on fire while in police custody. Drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A journalist is found dead at a martial arts contest, raising the possibility that two competitors are guilty of murder. The team calls the suspects in for an interview, but Jane comes up with an alternative plan to ensnare the culprit. Elsewhere, an internal investigator questions Rigsby about his father. Drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.sub-title: The Gimme a K Street Job.
programme.desc: The team is forced to tackle the US Congress to take down a competitive cheerleading company that is putting teenage girls at risk. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs and battle injustice in the corridors of power.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Nate becomes obsessed by a dying FBI agent's greatest failure, to allow skyjacker DB Cooper to escape justice, and a flashback to the 1970s helps solve the long-standing mystery. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team capture computer hacker Ajay Khan, who was recently responsible for hacking into NCIS's supposedly ultra-secure multiple-threat alert centre. They believe he could hold the key to tracking down the most-wanted cyber terrorist in the world, who may be plotting an attack using a bomb containing a strain of the Ebola virus. When Khan refuses to co-operate, Ziva and DiNozzo take him to Guantanamo Bay to be placed with people he had previously betrayed. Guest starring Vik Sahay (Chuck).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the case of a marine who dropped dead while scaling a wall on an assault course, and a fellow soldier reveals that he was heavily involved with an underground fight club, where competitors would battle for cash. Meanwhile, having returned to work after compassionate leave, Vance discovers paperwork and a key in his late wife's effects that lead him to a safety deposit box containing a stash of cash.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A criminal profiler joins the team to help investigate a double murder case that bears resemblances to crimes committed a decade previously by a serial killer known as the Caveman. Jane clashes with the newcomer's scientific approach and disagrees with her theories about potential suspects - so he fabricates a piece of evidence to throw her off course in the hope of outwitting the real culprit. Crime drama, guest starring Linda Park (Raines).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and Rigsby travel to Crane Creek, where they examine the murder of a film-maker who has been shot at close range. The local police identify a man who was accused of killing his wife two years previously as the main suspect, but when the agents close in, he takes the employees and customers at City Hall hostage, including Jane, who was settling a parking fine at the time. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team fakes the discovery of a legendary antique car to lure a Wall Street fraudster into breaking the immunity deal that protects him from prosecution. Drama about hi-tech crooks who use their skills to right corporate wrongs, battle injustice in the corridors of power and steal from wealthy criminals.(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: A broken leg leaves Parker behind on the crew's latest job. She spies on the Brew pub's customers for fun and discovers a group of thieves planning a heist.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While transporting the corpse of Lt Gordon Roth to the morgue, a flat tyre brings Ducky and Jimmy to a halt and they are abducted and taken to a remote cabin - where one of their captors wants the post-mortem to take place. Back at the scene, Abby finds a blood sample that does not belong to the victim, who in fact bore little resemblance to the picture of Roth in his old school yearbook. Guest starring Valerie Cruz (The Following).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is stabbed to death after stepping out of her shower, becoming the latest victim of the Dead Rose Slasher. Gibbs is approached by his old friend and barber Frankie Dean, who shares his concern that his son Cameron may be the killer. He explains that a photo-fit released to the media resembles him, and the attacks stopped during a period coinciding with his three-year stint in the navy. Meanwhile, Tony has to take probationary agent Ned Dorneget under his wing.(n)

programme.sub-title: Daesong Heavy Industries II: Return to Innocence.
programme.desc: Catastrophe strikes when the Smiths' ship explodes, and everyone is seperated in the ensuing chaos. Stan and Francine wash up on a island with no memory of how they got there, and end up resorting to primitive means to survive.(n)

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: A family living in a gated community fight to defend their home against vicious attackers during the one night each year when all crime is legal in this high-concept thriller from writer/director James DeMonaco (Staten Island). In the not-too-distant future, rampant crime and prison overcrowding have inspired the U.S. government to implement a unique solution to restore the peace: Each year, for a 12-hour period, any and all crime becomes permissible as police put their jobs on hold, and hospitals close their doors. It's called the Purge, and remarkably, the annual event leads to drastically reduced crime and record-low unemployment levels throughout the rest of the year. But this year, as suburban parents James (Ethan Hawke) and Mary (Lena Headey) place their home on lockdown for the annual event, a desperate man finds his way into their neighborhood while fleeing a sadistic gang of masked killers. In a moment of compassion, James and Mary's adolescent son (Max Burkholder) unlocks the door, offering sanctuary to the frightened stranger. Unfortunately for the entire family, that act of kindness may also be their very last, because now the killers who were pursuing the man have surrounded the house, and have vowed to kill everyone inside unless they are willingly given the man they are hunting within an hour. As the clock begins to tick, the family face a difficult dilemma -- do they sacrifice the life of a stranger in hopes of saving themselves, or attempt to stand their ground until the Purge expires?(n)

programme.title: District 9
programme.desc: Neill Blomkamp's debut feature is a thoughtful sci-fi thriller about aliens stranded on Earth, which tells a social parable that couldn't be more opposite to its South African setting. Back in the early 80s a spaceship grinds to a halt above Johannesburg. On investigation, the colossal craft is found to house insect-like bipeds, all in a very bad shape. Eventually allowed to land on the planet, the occupants are confined to District 9, a shabby outlying suburb. Now, around 20 years later, the entire population of 'prawns', as the aliens have offensively been labelled, are to be moved to a distant detention camp, with Afrikaner bureaucrat Wikus van de Merwe placed in charge of their relocation. But when van de Merwe has a grim accident, he's given a radically different perspective on the affair, and little choice but to team up with the extra-terrestrials. Mixing elements of horror and action-thriller into the allegorical whole, the Oscar- and Bafta-nominated fantasy, produced by Peter Jackson, uses top-notch CGI to create a believable setting and to move the pace along nicely. In English, with subtitles for the dialogue in Afrikaans, Nyanja, Zulu, Xhosa, Sotho and the aliens' language(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Sister City. Leslie gets to play host to Pawnee's sister city, the Parks and Recreation Department of Boraqua, Venezuela. Tom is made a errand boy and April is playing hard to get(n)

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: KaBOOM!. The department helps the non-profit group KaBOOM! build a playground in a neighbouring town. programme.desc: A former warrior surrenders his soul in order to save his family in this Dracula origins story(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Strong Arms of the Ma. After a mugging, Marge becomes agoraphobic, until she starts weight training, which turns her into a buff bully who enters a bodybuilding contest(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Great Wife Hope. Marge is on the offensive when a violent martial art takes over Springfield. But has Mrs Simpson met her match in promoter Chett Englebrecht?(n)

programme.desc: Gorgeous Grampa. The family see a different side to Grampa when he revisits his days as fearsome TV wrestler, 'Gorgeous Godfrey'(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Drift Problem. Archer's surprise birthday present—a high-tech "spy" car—leads to many other surprises, none of them good(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Lo Scandalo. Mallory claims to have been framed for killing her long-time lover, the Italian prime minister, and the gang have to help her cover up the crime fast(n)

programme.title: The Blue Dahlia
programme.desc: A war-weary pilot returns home from service in Europe, but his welcome is far from warm. Not only must he deal with the news of his wife's infidelities, but he also finds himself accused of her murder. However, the wife of his dead spouse's lover is on hand to help him prove his innocence. Thriller, written by Raymond Chandler and starring Alan Ladd, Veronica Lake, William Bendix and Doris Dowling.(n)

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: Notorious pirate Henry Morgan is made governor of Jamaica, and offers other buccaneers the choice of giving up their lawless ways or facing justice. Two rogues refuse to toe the line, so Morgan's trusted ally James Waring is sent to track them down, but has other things on his mind - namely winning the daughter of the previous governor away from her duplicitous fiance. High-seas adventure, with Tyrone Power, Laird Cregar, George Sanders, Maureen O'Hara and Anthony Quinn.(n)

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: An ageing hard-bitten rancher expects his two sons to follow in his footsteps and keep order in their lawless land with the force of the gun. One of his boys is a gentle soul with no appetite for violence, but his brother is trigger-happy and one day takes a step too far - leaving his father with an impossible decision. Western, starring Van Heflin, Tab Hunter and James Darren.(n)

programme.title: Comanche
programme.desc: A powerful Native American chief agrees to take part in peace talks with Washington after an encounter with a sympathetic scout. However, a group of renegade warriors are unwilling to surrender their arms and their actions prompt a bigoted government official to use brutal methods. Western, starring Dana Andrews, Kent Smith, Nestor Paiva and Henry Brandon.(n)

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: Siberian gulag prisoners stage a daring escape during the Second World War. Refusing to live under Stalin's rule, they embark on a gruelling 4,500-mile journey across inhospitable terrain to escape the Soviet Union. Peter Weir's drama, starring Ed Harris, Colin Farrell, Saoirse Ronan, Jim Sturgess and Mark Strong.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The heroic autobots discover that a spaceship from their own planet crashed into the moon decades ago, carrying their former leader and an incredibly powerful device. They must fight to defend the human race as their enemies the decepticons plot to use this machine to rebuild their own world and destroy the Earth. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley.(n)

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: A sceptical 18th-century detective is sent to a small hamlet supposedly terrorised by a demonic headless horseman who decapitates his victims. The investigator refuses to believe in the supernatural, convinced a human killer is behind the murders - but the legend proves to be all too true. Tim Burton's gothic horror, starring Johnny Depp, Christina Ricci, Miranda Richardson and Christopher Walken.(n)

programme.title: Mr X
programme.desc: Tessa Louise-Salome's documentary celebrates the work of the feted French auteur Leos Carax, who has released just five feature films between 1984 and 2012. She tracks his career through clips from his movies Boy Meets Girl, Mauvais Sang (aka The Night Is Young), Les Amants du Pont-Neuf, Pola X and Holy Motors, and there are interviews with the man himself, as well as collaborators and admirers including Juliette Binoche, Denis Lavant, Mireille Perrier, Eva Mendes and Kylie Minogue. In English, French and Japanese.(n)

programme.title: Attack
programme.desc: An American infantry lieutenant fighting in German-occupied Belgium is convinced an inept but well-connected officer is not fit for command. When his unit are wiped out after another of the officer's mistakes, the lieutenant miraculously survives and returns to base seeking revenge. Second World War drama, starring Jack Palance, Eddie Albert, Lee Marvin, Buddy Ebsen and Robert Strauss.(n)

programme.title: The Victors
programme.desc: A series of interlocking tales charting the advance of a US infantry across Europe. Initially based in Sicily, the soldiers are soon sent into battle in occupied France, moving into Germany as the Second World War comes to an end. Along the way, a member of the unit is tempted to desert by a woman who wants him to join her in the black market. Drama, starring George Peppard, Albert Finney, George Hamilton, Jeanne Moreau and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: Crash Dive
programme.desc: On the eve of departing for a dangerous mission, a submariner falls for a schoolteacher, unaware she is the sweetheart of his commanding officer. On board, the two men eventually discover they are romantic rivals, but form a close bond as they concentrate on their duty and the task of destroying enemy U-boats. Romantic wartime drama, starring Tyrone Power, Dana Andrews, Anne Baxter, May Whitty and Harry Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A reckless slacker joins the Navy, hoping to win the respect of his girlfriend's father, a stern admiral. He and his shipmates are put to the ultimate test as part of a force of vessels that must battle an invading fleet of powerful alien spaceships. Sci-fi adventure, starring Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard. Edited for language and violence.(n)

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: A woman who has been held captive for years lives in a single room with her son, who has never experienced life beyond its walls. She resolves to make sure he has a complete and fulfilling life, but when they finally escape, she faces the challenge of helping him cope with a world he has no experience of. Drama based on Emma Donoghue's novel, starring an Oscar-winning Brie Larson, with Jacob Tremblay, Joan Allen and William H Macy.(n)

programme.title: Mama
programme.desc: A man takes in his two nieces, who have been left to fend for themselves for years in a forest after their parents' deaths. He and his girlfriend try to give the almost animalistic children a normal life, unaware that a supernatural force that looked after the girls in the wild has followed them home. Horror, starring Jessica Chastain and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: The officers have a brush with fame as a BBC TV crew arrives in Gasforth to make a no-holds-barred documentary about the police force, and Fowler unexpectedly gets the chance to tackle a gunman live on air. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Mark Addy and Mina Anwar.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor returns home from a disastrous shopping trip to discover he has been burgled, and an unwelcome wedding invitation compounds his misery. Comedy, starring Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: A lovelorn Mervyn is driven to distraction by a woman working at the local pizza place. When he reveals that he lacks the courage to profess his feelings for her, Alvin and Entwistle decide that is it up to them to bring the would-be couple together. Comedy, starring Philip Fox.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Clegg and Truly reminisce about Compo, whose amorous intentions towards his neighbour Nora Batty - along with his accident-prone antics - were a constant source of amusement in the village.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Lenny turns up in the village once more, followed by his long-suffering assistant Cliff. This time, the show-business hopeful becomes convinced that he can finally make a name for himself by becoming an escapologist. Guest starring Tommy Cannon and Bobby Ball.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber takes up boxing and enters the prison championships. He is hot favourite to win until Fletcher is given the task of fixing the contest and nobbling his cell-mate. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale and Peter Vaughan.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del seizes a rare opportunity to make a quick profit and bring Trotters Independent Traders into the hi-tech world of satellite communications. Meanwhile, Rodney plunges to the depths of despair as his marriage continues to deteriorate. Comedy, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del snatches a chance to make a quick profit, leaving gullible Denzil stripped of his redundancy money. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: The officers have a brush with fame as a BBC TV crew arrives in Gasforth to make a no-holds-barred documentary about the police force, and Fowler unexpectedly gets the chance to tackle a gunman live on air. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Mark Addy and Mina Anwar.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy is promoted to the role of Bottom in an amateur dramatic production of A Midsummer Night's Dream. Comedy, starring Ronnie Corbett.(n)

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Godber takes up boxing and enters the prison championships. He is hot favourite to win until Fletcher is given the task of fixing the contest and nobbling his cell-mate. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker, Richard Beckinsale and Peter Vaughan.(n)

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: Victor returns home from a disastrous shopping trip to discover he has been burgled, and an unwelcome wedding invitation compounds his misery. Comedy, starring Richard Wilson and Annette Crosbie.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Some Adventures of the Inventor of the Mother Stitch.
programme.desc: Barry is shocked to discover his golf captain has moved in next door when Glenda shows a keen interest in her new neighbours. Hobbo tries to help a dejected Morton feel less lonely, while Hobbo's driving skills attract unwanted attention when he takes to the wheel of a truck following a visit to an inn.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: The Mother of All Mistakes - Or Is It?.
programme.desc: Hobbo discovers the whereabouts of his real mother and decides to pay her a visit, but is unimpressed by the welcome he receives. Marina chains herself to a supermarket trolley in protest against the unreliability of men, while Nelly reveals some information that greatly lifts Hobbo's spirits.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Howard Cross the Atlantic Single-Handed?.
programme.desc: Hobbo is convinced Nelly is his natural mother and tries to establish where he was born, while Howard vows to row across the Atlantic single-handed in a bid to counter Marina's suggestions that he lacks spontaneity. Barry's clothing problem is solved when he is called to help clear Toby's blocked drain.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del snatches a chance to make a quick profit, leaving gullible Denzil stripped of his redundancy money. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: An audition gives Raquel the chance of a lifetime - and perhaps more importantly, an excuse to get out of Nelson Mandela House. Del-Boy is as excited as she is about the prospect, but only because he sees himself as the man behind her rapid rise to stardom. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Smithy accompanies Nessa to the hospital for her first ultrasound scan, and the pair catch a glimpse of their baby. Stacey becomes unusually excited at the prospect of a weekend visit to her family home after she struggles to adjust to her role as an `Essex wife' - which proves to lack some of the glamour she had expected.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright is embarrassed after losing his trousers on the way to the wedding of Nurse Gladys Emmanuel's niece. Roy Clarke's classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Lynda Baron.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney make a bit of cash on a used-car deal and decide to celebrate in style with a night out in the West End. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Dara O Briain, Nina Conti and Danny Bhoy.
programme.desc: The stand-up comedy show has Dara O Briain warming up the crowd before introducing routines by ventriloquist extraordinaire Nina Conti and the irrepressible Danny Bhoy.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: First-ever episode of the comedy starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell as misfits who have an unhealthy dependence on each other. Mark sets himself the task of sleeping with his next door neighbour Toni, basing his seduction technique on the Battle of Stalingrad and plotting to humiliate his flatmate Jeremy in the process.(n)

programme.title: Little Britain
programme.desc: Dafydd's new career as a rent boy proves a success at the local mine, and Vicky shows off her dancing skills on the estate. programme.desc: Graham Lister tries to escape from the show, and Vic wonders where the Man with the Stick's kids are.(n)

programme.desc: Long-running Roy Clarke comedy. Truly hears his new neighbour - retired milkman Luther `Hobbo' Hobdyke (Russ Abbot) - has strong links to MI5 and the secret service. programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Nobody Messes with Tony the Throat.

programme.sub-title: Will Stella Find True Love with Norris Fairburn?.

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom draws on every resource in his efforts to practise self-sufficiency and builds a generator that runs on animal dung. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal.(n)

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom is tempted to earn some extra money, but it is not to pay the bills or replenish his dwindling savings. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Felicity Kendal, Penelope Keith and Paul Eddington. First broadcast in 1975.(n)

programme.title: The Fast Show
programme.desc: Rapid-fire comedy sketch show, featuring the Neighbours from Hell, a nauseatingly affectionate newlywed couple and a guest appearance by snooker player Steve Davis. Paul Whitehouse, Charlie Higson, Arabella Weir and Caroline Aherne star.(n)

programme.desc: First episode of the comedy, starring Brendan O'Carroll as a doting mother-of-six who constantly interferes in her children's lives. programme.desc: Richard Madeley and Judy Finnigan make guest appearances, as Lou qualifies for phone quiz You Say, We Pay. programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four of the eight chefs from yesterday's heat return to face a skills test in which they must make three different coconut tuiles to decorate quenelles of Chantilly cream. Michel Roux Jr then challenges them to re-create a classic recipe consisting of a rich beer soup with cheese-filled choux pastry buns. The contenders then prepare their own choice of dish to be judged by Michel and Monica Galetti, who pick three contestants to advance to the quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass: Cake.
programme.desc: Mary Berry makes a classic madeira cake followed by her frosted walnut cake, while Paul Hollywood makes hazelnut and orange biscotti and shows us the right way to make the technically tricky arlettes. Paul then demonstrates how to make a foolproof plait and Mary closes the show with her take on black forest gateau.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: John Torode and Gregg Wallace return to put more keen cooks to the test. The first six hopefuls take on a new challenge in which they prepare their Calling Card, a dish that represents who they are and showcases their talent. This is followed by the infamous Invention Test, in which there is now a choice of two boxes of ingredients, and the stakes are high because after that, two of the amateurs will be going home. The remaining four then replicate the conditions of restaurant service as they rustle up dinner for three discerning guests - 2005 MasterChef winner Thomasina Miers, 2008 winner James Nathan and 2010 finalist Alex Rushmer. It's then up to John and Gregg which two will advance to Friday's quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Mississippi Adventure
programme.desc: The duo relive their most memorable moments from the series, exploring the food culture and rich musical styles of the American south.(n)

programme.title: Gordon's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay explores the culinary traditions of Malaysia, and has a week to prepare for a competition in which national dishes are cooked. He also sources ingredients for birds' nest soup inside a bat-infested cave, samples bull-penis broth, and takes to the road with a group of bikers enthusiastic about their food.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Tom Kerridge is joined by fellow Michelin-starred chef Daniel Clifford for a discussion on luxury dishes, with the host pitting his coffee choux bun against his guest's smoked haddock with Iberico ham and beurre blanc. Drinks expert Joe Wadsack brings a white rioja and an Australian dessert wine to the table, while Arabella Weir is taught how to make an upmarket treat by a master patissiere and chocolatier.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Chef Angela Hartnett joins Michel Roux Jr in the kitchen for a discussion on food they consider a guilty pleasure. She creates a pizza bianco using rich and creamy Tallegio cheese, while resident drinks expert Kate Goodman picks three Italian reds that perfectly complement the dish. Plus, Rachel Khoo argues the case for full-fat food and Michel prepares an indulgent chocolate and salted caramel dessert.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass: Cake.

programme.title: James Martin's Food Map of Britain
programme.desc: Chef James Martin visits Northern Ireland in the hope of gaining an understanding of the rich flavours of the beef from native cattle the Dexter. He also visits the east coast, where he discovers why local lobsters are so prized by chefs, and cooks up a Goan lobster curry, and a fillet of Dexter beef served with a garlic and parsley risotto with caramelised onions.(n)

programme.title: James Martin's Food Map of Britain
programme.desc: The chef's tour reaches the south coast of England, where he discovers how the forests of Hampshire are home to one of Britain's most prized culinary ingredients, the truffle, and why tomatoes grown on the Isle of Wight are rivalling those from Italy. Along the way, he prepares forest truffle chicken and stuffed tomatoes.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass: Cake.
programme.desc: Mary Berry makes a classic madeira cake followed by her frosted walnut cake, while Paul Hollywood makes hazelnut and orange biscotti and shows us the right way to make the technically tricky arlettes. Paul then demonstrates how to make a foolproof plait and Mary closes the show with her take on black forest gateau.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: John Torode and Gregg Wallace return to put more keen cooks to the test. The first six hopefuls take on a new challenge in which they prepare their Calling Card, a dish that represents who they are and showcases their talent. This is followed by the infamous Invention Test, in which there is now a choice of two boxes of ingredients, and the stakes are high because after that, two of the amateurs will be going home. The remaining four then replicate the conditions of restaurant service as they rustle up dinner for three discerning guests - 2005 MasterChef winner Thomasina Miers, 2008 winner James Nathan and 2010 finalist Alex Rushmer. It's then up to John and Gregg which two will advance to Friday's quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four of the eight chefs from yesterday's heat return to face a skills test in which they must make three different coconut tuiles to decorate quenelles of Chantilly cream. Michel Roux Jr then challenges them to re-create a classic recipe consisting of a rich beer soup with cheese-filled choux pastry buns. The contenders then prepare their own choice of dish to be judged by Michel and Monica Galetti, who pick three contestants to advance to the quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Mississippi Adventure
programme.desc: The duo relive their most memorable moments from the series, exploring the food culture and rich musical styles of the American south.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Tom Kerridge is joined by fellow Michelin-starred chef Daniel Clifford for a discussion on luxury dishes, with the host pitting his coffee choux bun against his guest's smoked haddock with Iberico ham and beurre blanc. Drinks expert Joe Wadsack brings a white rioja and an Australian dessert wine to the table, while Arabella Weir is taught how to make an upmarket treat by a master patissiere and chocolatier.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Chef Angela Hartnett joins Michel Roux Jr in the kitchen for a discussion on food they consider a guilty pleasure. She creates a pizza bianco using rich and creamy Tallegio cheese, while resident drinks expert Kate Goodman picks three Italian reds that perfectly complement the dish. Plus, Rachel Khoo argues the case for full-fat food and Michel prepares an indulgent chocolate and salted caramel dessert.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: The four chefs from the first group who have yet to face their skills test are challenged by Monica Galetti and Gregg Wallace to prepare and cook abalone - a mollusc more common in the southern hemisphere. They then recreate a traditional Bordeaux recipe featuring duck breast in red wine sauce, as well as a classic dish of their own choosing, before Monica and Michel Roux Jr decide which three contestants advance to the quarter-final.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.sub-title: The Great British Bake Off Masterclass.
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood demonstrates how to make soda bread in under an hour and then bakes baguettes, arguably the most iconic of all French breads. Mary Berry makes cappuccino creme brulees without the use of a blow torch and creates classic meringue cake the Spanische windtorte. Plus, Paul decorates a pie and Mary reveals her tip to making the perfect checker board cake before going on to bake a tiered white chocolate and raspberry cheesecake.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Six more amateur cooks compete for a place in tomorrow's quarter-final, preparing a plate of food that represents who they are as their Calling Card and choosing one box of ingredients - either sweet or savoury - to rustle up a surprise dish in the Invention Test, before two of the hopefuls are sent home. The remaining four serve dinner for 2011 and 2013 MasterChef champions Tim Anderson and Natalie Coleman, as well as 2010 finalist Tim Kinnaird, before judges John Torode and Gregg Wallace decide who has made it through.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers examine the history behind some of the nation's most famous dishes, beginning by exploring how the monarchy has influenced British cuisine. The duo also prepare a classic coronation chicken, and a beef dish named after Prince Albert, and food historian Ivan Day whips up a meal using a cookbook from the time of James II.(n)

programme.title: Gordon's Great Escape
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay concludes his culinary journey in Thailand, where he joins the nation's equivalent of the WI as members compete for the title of Best Fish Paste, and works with a home cook in exchange for a spicy sausage recipe. His adventure comes to an end in a televised cook-off against celebrity chef McDang.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Tom Kerridge is joined by fellow Michelin-starred chef Raymond Blanc to cook two dishes using ingredients that have fallen out of favour. Raymond recreates a favourite souffle from his childhood using semolina and heritage apples vying for favour against the host's old-fashioned mutton chops with cabbage and turnip gratin. Plus, Oliver Peyton reports on a distilling revival.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: MasterChef: The Professionals judge Monica Galetti joins Michel Roux Jr in the kitchen to demonstrate that healthy food can still be delicious. She creates a flavour-packed meal that is low in fat and carbs, while drinks expert Kate Goodman surprises them both with some tasty, healthy beverages using bitters. Journalist William Sitwell asks whether food intolerances are all in the mind and Michel makes a refreshing tuna tartare.(n)

programme.desc: The chef travels to the flatlands of Lincolnshire to explore why the region is famed for its pork and how it has the ideal environment for the mass production of peas. programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: This thrilling action film offers non-stop, runaway adventure down the streets and freeways of L.A. Howard Payne is the psychotic villain who is first seen sabotaging a high-rise elevator. He will spare the passengers in exchange for cash. Enter Jack Traven and the S.W.A.T. team who in a daring rescue save the elevator and shoot Payne. Unfortunately Payne didn't die and later tells Traven his newest scheme: he has wired a Santa Monica bus, travelling during morning rush hour on the freeway, to explode if it goes under 50 mph. Jack gets on board and has to deal with a variety of panicky passengers while trying to gain control of the vehicle helmed by a wounded driver. Annie, recently arrested for speeding, replaces the driver. Now, under pressure from both passengers and headquarters, it is up to Jack to disarm the bomb. After a spectacular scene where the bus jumps a 50 foot gap in an overpass, the police guide it to the airport and disarm it. But Payne is still busy at work. His actions lead to one final, fatal face-off on a hellish subway ride(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

After being threatened with copyright violation by industry bigwigs, the duo are aided by the store's loyal customers in a bid to make a legitimate and original film about a local hero(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Now fully recovered from his amnesia, former CIA assassin Jason Bourne attempts to uncover the truth behind his father's death, while simultaneously exacting revenge and evading the government forces hot on his trail(n)

programme.desc: A profile of Larry Kramer, a dedicated activist and controversial writer who helped raise awareness of the AIDS crisis in the 1980s and change the way the U.S. government and the medical community responded to it after years of inaction(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Mummy'
programme.desc: A look at "The Mummy," a 2017 horror film about a cruel princess of ancient Egypt who wreaks havoc on humanity after she is accidentally resurrected. The film stars Tom Cruise, Sofia Boutella and Annabelle Wallis, and is directed by Alex Kurtzman(n)

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Batman (Ben Affleck) and Superman (Henry Cavill) clash over differing philosophies about what kind of heroism is needed to protect the world, while the public they're defending is becoming increasingly mindful of the damage that superheroes and masked vigilantes cause. However, the duo are soon forced to confront an even greater threat created by nefarious billionaire Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg). Directed by Zack Snyder, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice also co-stars Amy Adams as Lois Lane, Jeremy Irons as Alfred the butler, and Gal Gadot as Wonder Woman(n)

programme.title: The Golden Compass

Telecast live in the late Friday-evening hours, Real Time with Bill Maher included the usual topical banter and broadsides exchanged by host Maher and his politically diverse celebrity panelists, with a new feature added to the proceedings in which promising young comedians were given a showcase for their talents(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: In this horror sequel, Ed and Lorraine Warren investigate one of the UK's most-notorious hauntings(n)

programme.title: The Strange History of Don't Ask, Don't Tell
programme.desc: A look at the U.S. armed forces' ban on gays and lesbians includes remarks from activists, politicians, and active and former service members; and a timeline of the contentious process leading up to the repeal of Don't Ask, Don't Tell, which takes effect on Sept. 20, 2011, and allows homosexuals to serve openly for the first time. Directed by Fenton Bailey and Randy Barbato(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Sick of being bullied by her overpowering Greek family, dowdy Toula signs up for college. Despite every warning, Toula falls for a non-Greek guy, and it's not easy getting her clan to accept him. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting? Sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Captain Sullenberger made a safe landing of the US Flight 1549 on the Hudson River, saving 155 lives on board. A controversy circles around his extraordinary act which could tarnish his career(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: 06/14/2017. An interview with Sergey Kovalev; a breakdown of the Andre Ward-Kovalev rematch; a recap of Terence Crawford's New York fight; and a look back at the David Tua vs. Ike Ibeabuchi 1997 heavyweight bout(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Celestial intervention in the life of a bachelor sees him plunged into an alternative reality where he and his childhood sweetheart are happily married parents(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once again send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but his shock at coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower. Also starring Youki Kudoh and Noémie Lenoir, together with, in unlikely cameos, Max von Sydow and Roman Polanski(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Journalists report on contemporary athletics in this prize-winning sports magazine(n)

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: After losing his faith in Christmas and tearing apart his letter to Santa, a young boy (Emjay Anthony) accidentally summons the malevolent holiday demon Krampus. The following day, his family awaken to find that a massive blizzard has knocked out the power in their house, and they are soon forced to fight for survival as the fearsome folklore creature and his minions proceed to wreak havoc on the dysfunctional clan. Adam Scott, Toni Collette, and David Koechner co-star in this hybrid of black comedy and horror from director Michael Dougherty (Trick 'r Treat)(n)

programme.title: T.J. Miller Meticulously Ridiculous
programme.desc: Comedian T.J. Miller performs in Denver at the Paramount Theatre. Topics include nightmares; the differences between alcohol and marijuana; his favorite figure from history; and the challenges of talking about death(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) is a mathematical genius who works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations eager to hide their dirty money. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, Wolff agrees to help an accounting clerk at a robotics firm (Anna Kendrick) look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. J.K. Simmons, Jon Bernthal, Jeffrey Tambor, and John Lithgow co-star in this thriller directed by Gavin O'Connor (Warrior, Pride and Glory)(n)

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: This thrilling action film offers non-stop, runaway adventure down the streets and freeways of L.A. Howard Payne is the psychotic villain who is first seen sabotaging a high-rise elevator. He will spare the passengers in exchange for cash. Enter Jack Traven and the S.W.A.T. team who in a daring rescue save the elevator and shoot Payne. Unfortunately Payne didn't die and later tells Traven his newest scheme: he has wired a Santa Monica bus, travelling during morning rush hour on the freeway, to explode if it goes under 50 mph. Jack gets on board and has to deal with a variety of panicky passengers while trying to gain control of the vehicle helmed by a wounded driver. Annie, recently arrested for speeding, replaces the driver. Now, under pressure from both passengers and headquarters, it is up to Jack to disarm the bomb. After a spectacular scene where the bus jumps a 50 foot gap in an overpass, the police guide it to the airport and disarm it. But Payne is still busy at work. His actions lead to one final, fatal face-off on a hellish subway ride(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: Bored housewives Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfeiffer and Cher are irresistibly drawn to mysterious stranger Jack Nicholson in this devilishly dark comedy(n)

programme.title: Tracey Ullman's Show
programme.desc: Episode 3. Two naive Americans visit London; a topless Sally Preston holds her first meeting with constituents; Judi Dench sneaks into a movie theatre; a man pitches his latest idea for a weather app; a modelling agent does her best to scout new faces(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: Offbeat comedy about a video store employee and his hapless friend, who, after managing to wipe the films in the shop, must remake all the movies themselves. After being threatened with copyright violation by industry bigwigs, the duo are aided by the store's loyal customers in a bid to make a legitimate and original film about a local hero(n)

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Cops stash a lounge singer (Whoopi Goldberg) in a convent after she witnesses a murder involving her boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier is asked to get back into her habit when her old friends at St Catherine's Convent find difficulty in controlling a school filled with juvenile delinquents. But convincing everyone that Deloris is a nun is going to be a challenge in itself(n)

programme.title: Jason Bourne

programme.title: The Mothman Prophecies
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller centring on a journalist whose wife experienced a strange moth-like vision immediately before she was killed in a car accident. Two years later, driving to an interview, he suddenly finds himself hundreds of miles out of his way in the remote town of Point Pleasant, where there has been a proliferation of mothman sightings. His research leads him to believe that these visions are omens of disaster(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: Action thriller about a skydiving instructor who is plunged into the world of international espionage when one of his pupils falls to her death. Approached by a mysterious woman for lessons, he is horrified when her chute fails to open. Blamed for her death - and his training centre closed down - he becomes suspicious and decides to investigate, only to discover that the woman is very much alive... and a former KGB agent(n)

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom
programme.desc: Wonderful chemistry among leads Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo and Rachel Weisz sparks this enthralling caper comedy. The guys play sibling con men who are out to make a multi-million-dollar score, and Weisz portrays their victim, a kooky heiress they string along until complications, like she and Brody falling in love, put a hitch in their plan. Rinko Kikuchi is a blast as a demolition expert, "an artist with nitroglycerin," they employ as part of their sting. Robbie Coltrane, Maximilian Schell(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter joins forces with a witch to stop a plague that could decimate the population of New York City(n)

programme.title: Appaloosa
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen and Ed Harris star with Academy Award winner Renée Zellweger as two gunmen tracking an escaped murderer and a beautiful, dangerous widow with an agenda of her own whose paths collide in the lawless western town of Appaloosa. When Virgil Cole (Harris--A History of Violence) and Everett Hitch (Mortensen--A History of Violence, The Lord of the Rings films) arrive in Appaloosa, they find a small, dusty town suffering at the hands of a renegade rancher with so little regard for the law that he has taken supplies, horse and women for his own and left the city marshal and one of his deputies for dead. Cole and Hitch, itinerant lawmen, are used to cleaning up after opportunistic thieves, but this time they find an unusually wily adversary--one who raises the stakes not by playing with the rules, but with emotions.Written and directed by Ed Harris, based on the novel by Robert B. Parker(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: A Woman First. Selina's book finally arrives; Jonah has an important meeting; Dan, Ben and Kent go out for drinks(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: When internet terrorists try to bring the US to its knees by shutting down every major computer system, NYPD detective John McClane makes a stand. All-out action sequel(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Winter Is Coming. Set on the mythical continent of Westeros, the series follows several noble families as they vie to rule the land. While the heroes and villains in such tales are usually clearly delineated, the morality underpinning Game of Thrones is infinitely more complex(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Valar Morghulis. In the second-season finale, Luwin has advice for Theon as he calls his men to action. Meanwhile, Arya gets a gift from Jaqen; Jon proves his worth to Qhorin; Daenerys finds herself in unfamiliar surroundings; and Brienne silences Jaime(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Climb. Robb considers a compromise to mend his alliance with House Frey; Melisandre visits the Riverlands; Tywin plans strategic unions for the Lannisters; Jaime's fate is in Roose Bolton's hands; Jon prepares for a dangerous climb with the Wildings(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Oathkeeper. Jon welcomes volunteers; Bran, Jojen, Meera and Hodor seek shelter; Jaime and Brienne discuss his honor; Daenerys balances justice and mercy(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Hardhome. Jon pleads his case to form a new alliance north of the Wall that is immediately put to the test. Meanwhile, Arya makes progress in her training; Sansa learns surprising news about her family; and Daenerys and Tyrion find they have something in common(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Door. Sansa confronts Littlefinger about what he knew of Ramsay's intentions; Arya gets an opportunity to prove herself; Bran is transported to a dangerous place; Tyrion envisions an unusual alliance; Brienne undertakes an important new mission(n)

programme.desc: Coal Mining in the U.S. The coal industry in the U.S. is discussed(n)

programme.title: Babylon A.D.
programme.desc: In the near-future, tough mercenary Toorop is hired to transport a girl from Russia to New York, unaware that she is believed by some to be the new messiah(n)

programme.title: Rabbit Hole
programme.desc: A couple's happy lives are thrown into upheaval by the death of their son in a road accident. As they try to keep their marriage from falling apart, the wife forms a friendship with the driver responsible for the tragedy while the husband immerses himself in the past and turns to another bereaved parent for support(n)

programme.title: Making of 'The Birth of a Nation'
programme.desc: A look at "The Birth of a Nation," a 2016 dramatic retelling of American-born Nat Turner's bloody rebellion to free slaves in Virginia in 1831. The film stars Nate Parker, Aja Naomi King and Armie Hammer, and is written and directed by Parker(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: A stork and his human pal must team up to transport a baby girl to her expectant family, despite the fact that storks now work as couriers for an Internet merchant after getting out of the baby-delivery business(n)

programme.title: Risky Drinking
programme.desc: A look at alcohol use and abuse surveys medical professionals' views of addiction and dependence, and profiles individuals for whom imbibing has or may become problematic or even life-threatening, including a young woman in Denver who binge drinks on the weekends with her friends and a man with two grown children who has been in and out of rehab and detox a dozen times in four years(n)

programme.title: The Princess Diaries
programme.desc: Mia is a gawky California teen with nerdy pals and no boyfriend. But all that's about to change: she learns that she's heir to the throne of the obscure Genovia, followed by paparazzi and pestered by his schoolmates in this modern Golden Gate fairytale(n)

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: When it comes to dating, Christina Walters has a golden rule: avoid searching for Mr. Right and focus on Mr. Right Now. That is until one night at a club when she unexpectedly meets Peter, only to see him suddenly disappear the next day. She and her best friend Courtney decide to break the rules and go on a road trip to find him, encountering numerous misadventures along the way(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by co-stars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined cleaner who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist(n)

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Homer Wells is an orphan who spent most of his childhood at the St. Cloud Orphanage in rural Maine, where he grew up under the strong but affectionate care of Dr. Wilbur Larch. Larch has passed along his medical education to Homer, and the young man helps the doctor care for abandoned children and the newborn babies of unwed mothers; however, Homer refuses to assist Larch with illegal abortions performed on the side(n)

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: Owen Wilson and Jennifer Aniston go to the dogs with Marley & Me, a tale of a couple embarking on the adventure of marriage, career, family, and the world's worst dog. At least that's how writer and newlywed John comes to describe his blonde lab, Marley, when he takes the puppy home and finds that the fluff-ball has an uncanny ability to eat and/or destroy just about anything. As years go by, John and his wife, Jennifer, contemplate having babies and moving across the country, while Marley grows into 100 lbs. of funny, wild, completely untrainable canine companionship -- as well as one of the most important people in the family. Marley & Me is based on the best-selling autobiographical book by columnist John Grogan(n)

programme.desc: A hit man and a New York cop team up to get revenge on the killers who murdered their partners(n)

programme.title: The Mothman Prophecies
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller centring on a journalist whose wife experienced a strange moth-like vision immediately before she was killed in a car accident. Two years later, driving to an interview, he suddenly finds himself hundreds of miles out of his way in the remote town of Point Pleasant, where there has been a proliferation of mothman sightings. His research leads him to believe that these visions are omens of disaster(n)

programme.title: Making of 'All Eyez on Me'
programme.desc: A look at "All Eyez on Me," a 2017 biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur that chronicles his rise to fame and untimely death at the age of 25. The film stars Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira and Lauren Cohan, and is directed by Benny Boom(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: Action thriller about a skydiving instructor who is plunged into the world of international espionage when one of his pupils falls to her death. Approached by a mysterious woman for lessons, he is horrified when her chute fails to open. Blamed for her death - and his training centre closed down - he becomes suspicious and decides to investigate, only to discover that the woman is very much alive... and a former KGB agent(n)

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Affable everyman Walter Sparrow is given a second-hand detective novel 'The Number 23' for his birthday, but grows increasingly obsessed with the parallels he sees between his life and that of the book's protagonist(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom
programme.desc: Wonderful chemistry among leads Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo and Rachel Weisz sparks this enthralling caper comedy. The guys play sibling con men who are out to make a multi-million-dollar score, and Weisz portrays their victim, a kooky heiress they string along until complications, like she and Brody falling in love, put a hitch in their plan. Rinko Kikuchi is a blast as a demolition expert, "an artist with nitroglycerin," they employ as part of their sting. Robbie Coltrane, Maximilian Schell(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter joins forces with a witch to stop a plague that could decimate the population of New York City(n)

programme.title: Appaloosa
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen and Ed Harris star with Academy Award winner Renée Zellweger as two gunmen tracking an escaped murderer and a beautiful, dangerous widow with an agenda of her own whose paths collide in the lawless western town of Appaloosa. When Virgil Cole (Harris--A History of Violence) and Everett Hitch (Mortensen--A History of Violence, The Lord of the Rings films) arrive in Appaloosa, they find a small, dusty town suffering at the hands of a renegade rancher with so little regard for the law that he has taken supplies, horse and women for his own and left the city marshal and one of his deputies for dead. Cole and Hitch, itinerant lawmen, are used to cleaning up after opportunistic thieves, but this time they find an unusually wily adversary--one who raises the stakes not by playing with the rules, but with emotions.Written and directed by Ed Harris, based on the novel by Robert B. Parker(n)

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard

programme.desc: Winter Is Coming. Set on the mythical continent of Westeros, the series follows several noble families as they vie to rule the land. While the heroes and villains in such tales are usually clearly delineated, the morality underpinning Game of Thrones is infinitely more complex(n)

As they try to keep their marriage from falling apart, the wife forms a friendship with the driver responsible for the tragedy while the husband immerses himself in the past and turns to another bereaved parent for support(n)

programme.desc: A look at "The Birth of a Nation," a 2016 dramatic retelling of American-born Nat Turner's bloody rebellion to free slaves in Virginia in 1831. The film stars Nate Parker, Aja Naomi King and Armie Hammer, and is written and directed by Parker(n)

programme.desc: A look at alcohol use and abuse surveys medical professionals' views of addiction and dependence, and profiles individuals for whom imbibing has or may become problematic or even life-threatening, including a young woman in Denver who binge drinks on the weekends with her friends and a man with two grown children who has been in and out of rehab and detox a dozen times in four years(n)

programme.desc: When it comes to dating, Christina Walters has a golden rule: avoid searching for Mr. Right and focus on Mr. Right Now. That is until one night at a club when she unexpectedly meets Peter, only to see him suddenly disappear the next day. She and her best friend Courtney decide to break the rules and go on a road trip to find him, encountering numerous misadventures along the way(n)

programme.desc: Homer Wells is an orphan who spent most of his childhood at the St. Cloud Orphanage in rural Maine, where he grew up under the strong but affectionate care of Dr. Wilbur Larch. programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) is a mathematical genius who works as a financial consultant for criminal organizations eager to hide their dirty money. While being investigated by the Treasury Department, Wolff agrees to help an accounting clerk at a robotics firm (Anna Kendrick) look into fraud at her company, but the assignment will prove far more dangerous than he could have ever anticipated. J.K. Simmons, Jon Bernthal, Jeffrey Tambor, and John Lithgow co-star in this thriller directed by Gavin O'Connor (Warrior, Pride and Glory)(n)

programme.desc: A lovelorn composer flies to a Hawaiian resort in hopes of forgetting the woman who broke his heart, only to discover she and her new boyfriend have just checked in(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama. One of their cousins - an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules - comes in to defend them(n)

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral

programme.title: Rushmore
programme.desc: Wes Anderson's quirky comedy-drama, scripted by Anderson and Owen Wilson (their follow-up to the equally delightful Bottle Rocket), stars Jason Schwartzman as Max Fischer, a scholarship student at the exclusive Rushmore Academy who compensates for his feelings of inadequacy by organising a host of school societies. But when he falls for his teacher, Rosemary Cross, things get messy, and are further complicated when he finds out that she is having an affair with a rich parent, Herman Blume, who happens to be Max's hero and mentor. So begins a battle of wills between Max and Herman..(n)

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Off-beat comedy-drama starring Jeff Bridges as an unreconstructed hippy who calls himself The Dude. When he is visited by gangsters mistaking him for a wealthy industrialist known as the Big Lebowski, the Dude seeks out his namesake and is soon embroiled in a complex scheme which he has no hope of understanding, let alone surviving. This quirky film from the idiosyncratic Coen brothers was a hit with the critics and features the first ever point-of-view shot from inside a bowling ball. It's that kind of movie(n)

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Clothes make the superspy in this high-energy action comedy. Jimmy Tong (Jackie Chan) is a well-meaning but clumsy New York City cab driver who is tapped by Steena (Debi Mazar), associate to multi-millionaire Clark Devlin (Jason Isaacs), for a new job as Devlin's personal limo driver. After a mysterious accident lands Devlin in the hospital, Tong learns that his new boss has a secret -- when he's not wheeling and dealing in high finance, Devlin is also a secret agent for the CSA, a top-level security agency. The secret to Devlin's success as a spy is his trademark tuxedo, a suit which is loaded with special gadgets which turns him into a high-tech fighting machine. After Tong dons the tuxedo and is transformed into a martial arts master, he takes over for Devlin and discovers that the agent's injuries didn't happen by accident. As Tong tries to chase down a handful of international super-villains bent on world conquest, he has to deal with Devlin's new partner, Del Blaine (Jennifer Love Hewitt), a CSA rookie who is just as baffled by her new assignment as Tong. The Tuxedo marked the feature-film debut for director Kevin Donovan, who had previously won international acclaim for his work in television commercials(n)

programme.title: Major Payne
programme.desc: Comedy about a born fighter who is thrown out of the army and winds up training a group of junior cadets. Major Payne (Damon Wayans) is ejected from the army after his commanding officer advises him that he has killed everyone and that there is no one left to fight. In desperation, the fearsome Payne finds a civilian job teaching combat skills to a mixed bunch of kids at a private school - and the results are hilarious!(n)

Taken to a remote island which is the domain of the mysterious Dr Moreau (Marlon Brando), Douglas encounters a race of strange, sub-human creatures who intrigue him. programme.title: The Good Guy
programme.desc: After executive producing the acclaimed documentary Manda Bala and the J.M. Coetzee adaptation Disgrace, Julio DePietro makes his feature debut as a writer-director with The Good Guy, a drama about ambitious young Wall Streeters fighting each other -- and sometimes their own decent nature -- to get ahead in the world. Our narrator, Tommy (Scott Porter of TV's Friday Night Lights), is young, clever, charming, and attractive. He's got a smart, pretty girlfriend, Beth (Alexis Bledel of Gilmore Girls), an urban conservationist. He's also very good at his investment broker job, impressing his ruthless, cynical boss, Cash (erstwhile "Brat Pack" member Andrew McCarthy). When a key member of Tommy's sales team suddenly leaves for a competitor, Tommy needs to fill his spot quickly, and takes a chance on the bumbling Daniel (Bryan Greenberg, Bride Wars), a former Marine and computer geek who seems a bit naïve about high finance and a bit nervous around women. Tommy takes Daniel under his wing, showing him how to dress, where to socialize, and how to charm attractive women. Their relationship is threatened when Daniel begins spending more time with Beth, joining her book club, and becoming her confidant. Tommy begins to question his decision to share his wisdom with Daniel, while Daniel is forced to decide what success really means to him, and where his loyalties lie. The Good Guy also stars Anna Chlumsky (In the Loop) and Aaron Yoo (Disturbia). The film had its world premiere at the 2009 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: The arrival of Martin Scorsese's remake of the classic 1962 thriller stars Robert De Niro as pychopath Max Cady, out of prison after fourteen years and bent on revenge. The object of his hate is Sam Bowden, the lawyer who failed in his defence of Cady at the latter's trial. Now Sam and his family (wife Jessica Lange and daughter Juliette Lewis, in an outstanding debut) are about to be terrorized by Max, who is determined that they should "learn something about loss". But the Bowden family are not themselves completely innocent: both women find themselves strangely attracted to the murderer, and Sam himself may have withheld some vital evidence at Cady's trial which could have changed the jury's verdict(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Straight Outta Compton'
programme.desc: A look at "Straight Outta Compton," a 2015 drama that chronicles the history of the hip-hop group NWA in 1980s California. The film stars Jason Mitchell, Corey Hawkins, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Aldis Hodge and Neil Brown Jr., and is directed by F. Gary Gray(n)

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: Pop icon Marc Anthony steps into the role of Salsa superstar Hector Lavoe in this biopic that follows the singer from his early career success as a Puerto Rican teen sensation to his later status as a New York City Latin idol while also documenting his ongoing struggle against drug and alcohol addiction. Actress and pop star Jennifer Lopez co-stars as Puchi; Lavoe's longtime muse and love interest(n)

programme.title: Behind the Candelabra

programme.title: Term Life

programme.title: Indignation

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with vastly different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of New York City. Taking a break from her long-term boyfriend Josh (Nicholas Braun), Alice (Dakota Johnson) sets out on a journey of self-discovery with her hard-drinking new friend Robin (Rebel Wilson). Meanwhile, Alice's career-driven older sister Meg (Leslie Mann) struggles with the idea of settling down, and uptight romantic Lucy (Alison Brie) searches for her perfect match. Adapted from former Sex and the City writer Liz Tuccillo's debut novel, this modern rom com was directed by Christian Ditter(n)

Upon returning to her hometown to once again be a bridesmaid in yet another wedding, jet-lagged, gin-soaked travel writer Pippa McGee (Graham) soon learns that her tyrannical publishing magnate father has been hospitalized after suffering a serious heart attack. As Pippa rushes to his bedside and the ailing mogul asks her to take editorial control of one of his most popular magazines, her excitement soon turns sour upon learning that the magazine in question is not a political or travel magazine, but the one and only Wedding Bells monthly.
